title: Sketch Dev Internship
description: During my 7-month internship at Sketch Development, my fellow interns and I migrated Jira plugins and databases from Heroku to AWS, Dockerized applications, fixed bugs, and documented the process, ensuring a smooth transition to the development team and enhancing my Docker skills.

title: Pursuit Alert
description: Counter surveillance system that detects vehicles that may be following you using ALPR. Designed simply with open source projects.

title: Antarctic Intelligence
description: I designed and developed the website for Antarctic Intelligence, a consulting firm, leveraging Squarespace to ensure a professional and user-friendly online presence.

title: Goblin Code
description: For the Missouri Hacks 2024 Competition at Mizzou, I developed a game that earned me the Creativity Prize and a $25 award, competing against 31 other participants.

title: Troop 677 Website
description: Over a year, I led a team to redesign our Boy Scout Troop's website, enhancing it with custom CSS, JavaScript, and HTML on Troop Web Host. This experience sharpened my leadership and web development skills.
